name: Paptic
goal: To offer sustainable alternatives to replace harmful oil-based plastic materials in packaging and many other applications. Our materials are renewble, resource-efficient, recyclable and reusable.
interests: Climate Action, Environment, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: The european plastic strategy and everything linked to it is of our interest. The strategy should be to support the use of new materials replacing plastics. that is by far the most efficient way to fight against the plastic waste accumulation problem.
